overview.en: USDK is an "ERC-20" digital asset issued by Prime Trust and operates on the Ethereum blockchain. The USDK is issued and redeemed by the Prime Trust for one dollar, and the assets held by the Prime Trust are guaranteed on a one-to-one basis.
overview.zh: USDK is an "ERC-20" digital asset issued by Prime Trust and operates on the Ethereum blockchain. The USDK is issued and redeemed by the Prime Trust for one dollar, and the assets held by the Prime Trust are guaranteed on a one-to-one basis.
